ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Id <> '005A0000002QyR3', OR( ISPICKVAL( Adobe_Enterprise_Program__c , 'EA' ) , ISPICKVAL( Adobe_Enterprise_Program__c , 'CLP' ) , ISPICKVAL( Adobe_Enterprise_Program__c , 'VIP' ) ) , ISBLANK( CLP_number__c ) , S_P_Vendors_Name__c = 'Adobe')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If “EA”, “CLP”, or “VIP” was selected, Program Number is required.
